verbs.description: [V: Was] President Trump thinking ahead to a time when he might need potential witnesses against him to avoid a court order ?
Was [ARG0: President Trump] [V: thinking] [ARGM-DIR: ahead] [ARG1: to a time when he might need potential witnesses against him to avoid a court order] ?
Was President Trump thinking ahead to a time when he [V: might] need potential witnesses against him to avoid a court order ?
Was President Trump thinking ahead to [ARGM-TMP: a time] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: might] [V: need] [ARG1: potential witnesses against him] [ARGM-PRP: to avoid a court order] ?
Was President Trump thinking ahead to a time when [ARG0: he] might need potential witnesses against him to [V: avoid] [ARG1: a court order] ?
